channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 17:23 Failure of anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv district
item.description: 游리 17:23 Failure of anxiety in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Kharkiv region- Kharkiv district#m_harkiv_tha_tha_harkivska_harkivska_The. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
